definitions.definition: A false accusation or charge brought to tarnish another's reputation or standing .
Falsifications or misrepresentations intended to disparage or discredit another.
examples: Accusations of abuse were pure extortive calumny in a malicious bid to make money.

main_definition: ( countable ) A false accusation or charge brought to tarnish another's reputation or standing .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Falsifications or misrepresentations intended to disparage or discredit another.
